deterministic_simulation_harness.description: Fully reproducible simulation protocol for deterministic intelligence testing across AON hubs. Executes harmonized logic and predictive evaluation with zero drift tolerance.

determinism_controls.session_seed: auto-generate or manually specify for replay

execution_flow.1_LOAD_CONTEXT: Pull all referenced overlays and session seeds
execution_flow.2_VALIDATE_HASHES: Verify checksums of input and Fusion Cell Law
execution_flow.5_RUN_ENGINES: Compute outputs via frozen parameter maps
execution_flow.6_RUN_ARCHETYPES: Apply symbolic and harmonic logic deterministically
execution_flow.8_GENERATE_OUTPUT: Commit reproducible forecast with integrity proofs

meta.notes: Produces identical results for identical inputs across all validated runtimes. Ensures deterministic harmonization through context signature binding and session lock records.

execution_prompt.instruction: Execute this harness in deterministic mode. Load identical inputs and overlay references across environments. Ensure all checksums and context signatures match before computation. Return results conforming to output_schema and verify replay_verification == MATCH. Commit resulting hash data into /SESSION_STATE/LOCKS for archival.
